duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and develop a new category of softgoods products for Apple Vision Pro.
Design and build prototypes for product exploration in collaboration with Industrial Design and Human Factors teams.
Seamlessly integrate electrical and mechanical components into softgoods for functional and aesthetic products.
Lead the definition of Softgoods architecture and design, develop, and ship products to amaze and delight customers.

education_certification.credential: BS Mechanical Engineering required; MS preferred.
